DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT 'Trade:'+TradeId+'/'+LegType+'/'+Currency+'/'+convert(varchar,Id) LegDataId, T1.SeqId, T4.value Type, T1.Value, T1.StartDate, T1.EndDate, T1.Frequency, T9.value Underflow FROM ORE.dbo.PortfolioLegAmortizations T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.PortfolioLegData T2 ON T1.LegDataId = T2.Id INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesAmortizationType T4 ON T1.Type = T4.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T9 ON T1.Underflow = T9.value

field.name: *LegDataId
field.lookup: SELECT 'Trade:'+TradeId+'/'+LegType+'/'+Currency+'/'+convert(varchar,Id) LegDataId,Id FROM ORE.dbo.PortfolioLegData ORDER BY TradeId

field.name: *Type
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Type,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesAmortizationType !T! ORDER BY !T!.value

field.name: Underflow
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Underflow,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY !T!.value
